channel.title: Npc points
channel.description: how i can add a npc give dung points in zenith-scape because im adding my own custom area and npc will give dung points for kill them 667/7**

item.title: Npc points
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Don’t copy and paste the code.

The main point I was trying to get to you was the dungeonPoints += 5 part. Put it where you want it to add the dungeoneering points. If npchandler is where it handles NPC combat, then yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc points
item.dc:creator: @i_pwn_u11 i_pwn_u1
item.description:
@i_pwn_u11 wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:2, topic:534039”][code=java] public int dungeonPoints; //Create this var

public void handleNpcKilling() { //You probably already have a method that handles NPC combat.
	switch (npcId) {
		case 0:
			//blah
			dungeonPoints += 5;
		break;
	}
}[/code][/quote]

where its goes? npchandler?

Read full topic
